divs: Sighting Detailson march 28th 2011 at about 330am i was watching tv and i went outside to get my cat and usually i look at the stars and try to find the moon and constellations, while i was doing this right above me head i noticed what to me looked like a shooting star so im watching it and it fades out of sight within maybe 15 secounds and then it appears back and its circling about a half inch from where it fades it circles about 7-8 times and then it just is gone soo i found my cat and went back to watching tv but i nvr 4got that and finally i got on here to report it incase i did witness something chico california march 28th 2011 it wasnt stormy or cloudy there were an abundance of stars, after i saw it i was really excicted and like freaking out cause its fun to see shooting stars but to see one that starts to go in circles that was amazing
